title: [Self-Directed] Mechanism-Based Instructional Design for Understanding Spatial Causal Relationships

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic principles of ecology/environmental science
context.additional_context: Developing teachable strategies applicable to real educational settings for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain causal relationships separated by physical/attentional spaces based on underlying mechanisms
Learners can connect complex environmental science causal phenomena with visual/non-visual materials
Learners can implement instructional design that effectively conveys spatial causal relationships through project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
